channel.title: Client not connecting
channel.description:
i opened up a silent made by ~Google~ and this error cane up.
[code]Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4591) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.destroy(Applet_Sub1.java:198) at Applet_Sub1.windowClosing(Applet_Sub1.java:431) at java.awt.Window.processWindowEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.processEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4591) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.destroy(Applet_Sub1.java:198) at Applet_Sub1.windowClosing(Applet_Sub1.java:431) at java.awt.Window.processWindowEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.processEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4591) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.destroy(Applet_Sub1.java:198) at Applet_Sub1.windowClosing(Applet_Sub1.java:431) at java.awt.Window.processWindowEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.processEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
and it kept saying connection error trying in (so many seconds) Is there a way to fix this or is the client to much to be fixed?

item.title: Client not connecting
item.dc:creator: @monkey12 monkey12
item.description:
